comments: Collins (ATL) and Bridges (CHA) engage and disengage with one another off-ball.
Washington (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Young's (ATL) path and absorbs the contact.
Collins (ATL) brings his right hand forward toward Smith's (CHA) front and marginal contact occurs at the end of Smith's drive.
Huerter (ATL) legally contests Martin's (CHA) jump shot attempt. Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Collins (ATL) is turning slightly as he firms up in his screening position and he absorbs the contact with Smith (CHA) as the defensive switch takes place.
Collins (ATL) and Smith (CHA) engage and disengage with one another as Collins rolls toward the lane.

Oubre Jr. (CHA) brings his arm down and, after making initial contact with the ball, brushes Collins' right side after his gather. Washington (CHA) avoids making contact with Collins and legally contests the shot attempt.
Collins (ATL) and Washington (CHA) move toward one another in pursuit of the rebound and incidental body contact occurs as Washington retrieves the ball.
Washington (CHA) turns alongside Young's (ATL) path and marginal body contact occurs as Young drives inside the perimeter.
Bridges (CHA) elevates to pursue the loose ball and marginal contact occurs with Collins' (ATL) front as he brings his left hand forward.

Collins (ATL) re-establishes himself in Washington's (CHA) path and absorbs the contact that occurs as he sets the pick. After the initial contact, incidental arm contact occurs as Washington attempts to defend over the pick.
Martin (CHA) stays in bounds prior to and as he receives the pass.
Gallinari (ATL) is drawn into the air on the pump fake and turns slightly toward Martin (CHA) when marginal body contact occurs as Martin is passing.
Gallinari's (ATL) lower half extends backward and marginal body contact occurs with Washington (CHA) as Washington elevates for the dunk attempt.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) and Gallinari (ATL) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Bridges (CHA) engages and disengages with Collins (ATL) during the inbound.
Bridges (CHA) and Huerter (ATL) move toward one another and incidental body contact occurs as they each pursue the rebound.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) jumps toward Collins (ATL) and marginal contact occurs with Collins' front as he receives the pass.

Replay review of the out of bounds call pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. The call on the floor of Bridges (CHA) touching the ball last before it goes out of bounds stands. The game clock was reset to 0:27.5.
Collins (ATL) establishes himself in a screening position in Martin's (CHA) path following the hand-off and does not deliver the contact as the defensive switch takes place.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) brings his left forearm toward Young's (ATL) front and marginal contact occurs as Young dribbles along the perimeter.
Huerter (ATL) commits a take foul on Martin (CHA).
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Collins' (ATL) jump shot attempt.
